patthana7.6:4.1: Nasavitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe ….
patthana7.6:5.1: Naavitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naavitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe ….
patthana7.6:6.1: Naavitakkaavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naavitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.6:7.1: Hetuyā aṭṭhacattālīsa, ārammaṇe pañcacattālīsa, adhipatiyā sattacattālīsa … pe … purejāte āsevane catucattālīsa … pe … avigate aṭṭhacattālīsa.
